data.message: Facebook!Someone in Illinois is using my account!I've changed the password 3 times,but yet,they are still getting on my account!When are you gonna do something about this!

replies.message: Thanks for your question, David. We take privacy and security very seriously. That's why we provide several tools and tips for you to keep your account safe. You can learn all about them on Privacy Basics at: http://bit.ly/2r5pMpL. -Brittany
Yeah!I've tried all of them and yet they are still using my account!This is twice,now,that this has happened!Now its your turn to do something!

Hello sir David, as far as i concern try to change your email address that is connected to your facebook account they might know your email address that's why they keep on getting your password even though you change it :) you can link many email to your facebook as your security for your password recovery. Try to delete the old one and make 2 or more email. That's the only way i did why the hackers leave my account alone :) this was just a tip it's up to you if you want to do it :) God Bless!

Pretty sure they have it bookmarked on theirs likely you went to a friends house used facebook and left it logged in so when they went to use theirs they saw yours and was logged in they don't lose access unless you find where or how to log all people logged in off including yourself then your new passwords would protect it just my guess at what may have happened
No I didn't.Been using the same wifi,same cellphone.it started in Louisiana,now there!Complaining for months!
please try to reset your phone,, maybe they have apps or virus(worm) installed in your device ,, and then log-out your account in all devices,, it's located in fb settings
